title: Light and bright 2 bedroom 2 bathroom condo
posting_body: ['Beautiful second story unit in the highly desirable Carlton Forest neighborhood and Novi school district.', 'This light and bright 2-bedroom/2 bath floor plan is full of upgrades and offers TWO balconies.', 'Neutral paint, seamless hardwoods, gas fireplace and soaring cathedral ceilings lend to the openness of the great room.', ' The kitchen has stainless steel appliances, countertop seating and doorwall to the balcony overlooking a serene greenspace.', ' Large laundry room has an additional room attached that is great for extra storage or could be used as a home office.', ' Hardwoods throughout both bedrooms.', ' Primary suite offers 3 large closets!', 'Completely updated en-suite bathroom with custom tilework and double vanity.', 'Full second bath convenient for guests.', ' Two car attached garage with direct access to the unit.', ' Convenient to EVERYTHING Novi has to offer including Twelve Oaks and Novi Town Center.', ' Just a short walk to Walled Lake to enjoy the large open green spaces and walking paths.', ' HOA includes snow removal, grounds maintenance and water.', ' A must see!', 'EMAILS MUST HAVE A CONTACT NUMBER TO GET A RESPONSE.']
